text: Rucentra melancholica is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Schwarzer in 1931. It is known from Java.BioLib.cz - Rucentra melancholica. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Apomecynini Category:Beetles described in 1931
title: Rucentra melancholica
